text: Egha Iesus ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Oio, ia Jerusalemɨn adarasi, kɨ ian apangkufi! Ia Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibav sozi me ariaghiri, egha God ia bagha amadir gumaziba, ia dagɨaba isa me ginivi me ariaghiri. Dughiar avɨribar kɨ ian boriba akuv me mughasa, mati tuarir amebam uan avɨzimingɨn nguziba avarazɨ moghɨn, kɨ ia damuasa ifonge. Ezɨ ia na bagh izan aghua.
